official_title: A concurrent resolution authorizing and requesting the President to establish May 29 as a day of remembrance of John F. Kennedy.

summary.text: Requests the President to designate May 29 of each year as a day of remembrance of John F. Kennedy.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing and requesting the President to establish May 29 as a day of remembrance of John F. Kennedy.
